meaningMnemonic:
The <kanji>address</kanji> <kanji>name</kanji> is the name that's on the address, making it the <vocabulary>addressee</vocabulary>. This can also mean <vocabulary>name and address</vocabulary>.

This can be used for both physical mail and email.
readingMnemonic: The reading for 宛 is the same one you learned for the kanji. The reading for 名 comes from the kun'yomi reading, which you learned in the vocabulary word 名 and 名前. So, the reading for this word is <reading>あてな</reading>.
